entry.title: üéâ Welcome to subscribe to App Store Discounts
entry.summary: Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!
entry.content:
Thank you for subscribing to our RSS feed. We are a community-driven project dedicated to bringing the latest App Store discount information to users worldwide. Our goal is to ensure that every user can stay up-to-date with the promotional activities of their favorite apps, whether it's price reductions on the apps themselves or limited-time promotions for in-app purchases. We will cover them all for you!

About our RSS feed

  • Focused on delivering App Store app discount information
  • Whenever an app's price drops or in-app purchases go on sale, we will promptly send you a notification
  • Each app's discount information is presented in a separate feed
  • The RSS feed is completely open-source, allowing you to view, contribute, and add your favorite apps at any time

Find Us

App Store Discounts

Finally

If this project has been helpful to you, would you kindly give us a ‚≠êÔ∏è

entry.title: Dead Cells
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$8.99 ‚Üí $5.99 Ôºâ

Application Description

Death is not the end. Play as a failed alchemic experiment and explore the sprawling, ever-changing castle to find out what happened on this gloomy island‚Ä¶! That is, assuming you‚Äôre able to fight your way past its keepers. Dead Cells is a roguevania action platformer that will require you to master frantic 2D combat with a wide variety of weapons and skills against merciless minions and boss. Kill. Die. Learn. Repeat. First available on PC and consoles, the indie hit Dead Cells is now slaying foes on mobile! Main Features ‚Ä¢ Roguevania: The progressive exploration of an interconnected world, with the replayability of a rogue-lite and the adrenaline-pumping threat of permadeath ‚Ä¢ Frantic and Dynamic 2D Action: Learn your enemies‚Äô patterns to stay alive, or prepare to be sent back to your cell before you can say ‚Äúbaguette‚Äù ‚Ä¢ Nonlinear Progression: Unlock new levels with every death, opt for the path that suits your current build, your playstyle or just your mood. Surely, the ramparts can‚Äôt be as bad as the sewers, right? ‚Ä¢ Play at your own pace: Will you explore every nook and cranny of the castle, or rush to the end? RETURN TO CASTLEVANIA DLC Time for some vampire slaying ‚Ä¢ New storyline - overcome the Ruler of Darkness alongside Alucard and Richter Belmont, ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Explore Dracula's Castle and its outskirts ‚Ä¢ 9 new monsters - Werewolves, haunted armors, and medusas are waiting for you ‚Ä¢ 14 new weapons - wield the Vampire Killer or the Holy Water to defeat creatures of the night, ‚Ä¢ 3 new bosses - go fangs to fangs against Death and Dracula himself ‚Ä¢ 20 new outfits - dress as your favorite Castlevania characters such as Simon and Richter Belmont or Alucard ‚Ä¢ Alternative soundtracks - play along 51 Castlevania original tracks and 12 tunes reimagined in the style of Dead Cells THE BAD SEED DLC You reap what you sow ‚Ä¢ New levels to lose your head in the not-so-peaceful Dilapidated Arboretum and the noxious Morass of the Banished ‚Ä¢ New monsters to rip to pieces: get to know the locals, such as the Jerkshroom and the Yeeter ‚Ä¢ New weapons to play with: trim sticking-out heads with the Scythe Claw, or make them dance to the sound of the Rhythm n' Bouzouki ‚Ä¢ New boss to fight against: Mama Tick is dying to meet you FATAL FALLS DLC Ready for a leap of faith? ‚Ä¢ 3 new biomes - Get some fresh air at the Fractured Shrines, splash around at the Undying Shores and take a picture at the Mausoleum ‚Ä¢ 8 new monsters - The Cold Blooded Guardians and their friends would love to teach you about their culture. ... Wait, aren't those relatives of yours in the Undying Shores...? ‚Ä¢ 7 new weapons - Lil' Serenade is perfect for breaking the ice with the locals, although the Snake Fangs would make for a perfect souvenir... ‚Ä¢ 1 new boss - The Scarecrow is very proud of his gardening skills and won't hesitate to show off QUEEN AND THE SEA DLC Take it to the sea! ‚Ä¢ 2 new biomes - Battle your way through a rotten shipwreck, or scale a burning lighthouse and confront your deadliest foe yet. ‚Ä¢ 9 new weapons, including a throwable shark, a trident and a pirate hook hand (eyepatch not included). ‚Ä¢ 2 new bosses - Don't lose your head before you meet the Queen! This DLC also gives you the usual extras: - A not-so-cute pet. - Loads of new outfits. - New enemies to bash. WARNING: Devices with less than 2 Gb of RAM may not be able to run this content correctly. We recommend not to take this DLC if your device is under 2gb of RAM. Carefully redesigned for mobile with a revamped interface ‚Ä¢ Two game modes available: Original & Auto-Hit ‚Ä¢ Custom controls & More touch controls options available: Change the buttons‚Äô position and size to your liking, swipe to dodge‚Ä¶ ‚Ä¢ MFi external controller support ‚Ä¢ No ads, no F2P mechanics! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue.

Application Screenshot

iPad

entry.title: Little Nightmares
entry.content:
Discount InformationÔºàPriceÔºö$7.99 ‚Üí $6.99 Ôºâ

Application Description

Escape your childhood fears. First available on PC and consoles, the horror adventure tale Little Nightmares is available on mobile! ‚Ä®Immerse yourself in Little Nightmares, a dark whimsical tale that will confront you with your childhood fears! Help Six escape The Maw ‚Äì a vast, mysterious vessel inhabited by corrupted souls looking for their next meal. As you progress on your journey, explore the most disturbing dollhouse offering a prison to escape from and a playground full of secrets to discover. Reconnect with your inner child to unleash your imagination and find the way out! Little Nightmares features a subtle mix of action and puzzle-platformer mechanics rooted in an eerie artistic direction and creepy sound design. Sneak your way out of the Maw‚Äôs dreary maze and run from its corrupted inhabitants to escape your childhood fears. FEATURES - Tiptoe your way through a dark and thrilling adventure - Rediscover your childhood fears inside a haunting vessel and escape its eerie inhabitants - Climb, crawl and hide through nightmarish environments to solve tricky platform puzzles - Immerse yourself in the Maw through its creepy sound design CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - Compatible with MFi controllers If you run into a problem, please contact us at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/12-playdigious/ with as much information as possible on the issue.
